question: You have found an interesting website. Write a letter to your friend to tell about the website.In your letter, you should:•	describe what the website is•	explain why the website is interesting in•	tell how this website will help him/her.
text: I hope you are staying safe during the quarantine and every member of yours is fine as well. Anyway, the reason I am writing to you is that I’ve found a cool website. Do you remember you’ve told me that you would like to learn how to do pull-ups? So, I was surfing on the Internet and bump up on the website named “Spartan”, which is dedicated to fitness and related topics such as techniques of different strength exercises and workout programs. As well as this, there are various meal plans depending on a goal, if somebody wants to gain weight or lose it.

Thus, I reckon that it would be useful for you because you can follow a specific program for your back muscle, and finally, you will be able to perform pull-ups. Speaking of which, I’ve already started to do exercises from the website and it is obvious that my pull-ups technique is improving rapidly. Therefore, I advise you to look it through.
